elements.text: What Property can be considered as collateral for Home?

text: You can provide your self-occupied residential property as collateral where construction is proposed or the property you are going to buy in case of Home Purchase Loan.

elements.text: How do I apply for a Home Loan at Ujjivan?

text: You can contact our home loan team at your nearest Ujjivan branch or give a miss call on 9241434343

elements.text: What are the documents required to avail Home Loan from Ujjivan?

text:
For Salaried Individuals

Proof of Residence - Any one of Ration Card/Telephone Bill/Electricity Bill/Voters Card/Aadhar Card.
Proof of Identity - Any one of Voters Card/Drivers License/Aadhar Card/Passport.
Latest 6 months Bank Statement/Passbook.
Original Property Documents.
Salary certificate wherever applicable.

For Self-Employed Individuals

Proof of business – Business registration proof, E-bill, Rent agreement etc.
Proof of Residence - Any one of Ration Card/Telephone Bill/Electricity Bill/Voters Card/Aadhar Card.
Proof of Identity - Any one of Voters Card/Drivers License/Aadhar Card/Passport.
Latest 6 months Bank Statement/Passbook.
Original Property Documents.

elements.text: How much time will it take to decide upon an application for Home Loan at Ujjivan?

text: Applications would be decisioned within 7 working days.

elements.text: What is interest rate for pre-EMI and EMI?

text:
EMI interest rate is 12.75-17.75% depending on customer profile and requirement.
Pending final disbursement, you pay interest on the portion of the loan disbursed. This interest is called pre-EMI interest. Pre-EMI interest is payable every month from the date of each disbursement up to the date of commencement of EMI. The interest rate is same as that of EMI.
*Conditions apply. All Home Loans from Ujjivan Small Finance Bank Credit are at sole discretion of Ujjivan Small Finance Bank.

elements.text: Can I give standing instructions to repay my Home Loan EMIs directly from my Ujjivan Saving Bank Account?

text: Yes, you can opt for Automated Repayment and your EMIs will be directly repaid from your Ujjivan Small Finance Bank Savings Account, thus saving you the trouble of procuring, signing and tracking post-dated cheques.

elements.text: Are my property documents safe with Ujjivan Small Finance Bank?

text:
Ujjivan offers in-house scrutiny of property documents for your complete peace of mind. So be assured that your property documents are in safe hands.
For more details, please contact your nearest Ujjivan branch or give a miss call on 9241434343
